attributes.action: PM Boris Johnson should step down for mishandling the response to corona virus.
attributes.additional_details:
Boris Johnson is out of his depth and he needs to be replaced with someone fit and proper to do the job. 
The PM's response to this crisis has been wholly inadequate and it come's as no surprise to many that the UK has the 2nd highest death rate in the world.

So sign this petition and lets call for Boris Johnson to be sacked and replaced by someone who will lead us out of this mess.
attributes.background:
Boris Johnson should be sacked for mishandling the corona virus crisis. Someone who is capable of the job should replace him and get everything organised and sorted.

The response from the government on everything associated with the corona virus has been too little, too late.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked, resign or for a vote of no confidence.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.  

You might like to sign this petition calling for a public inquiry into the handling of coronavirus:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302576
